Palace of the Allele Sect

game effects

Nomads get +3 to their rolls while on this territory and can take an additional injury.

card variation

Terrain Feature

Scarcity

Founder's Deck

History

Coming upon a familiar place of rest, the explorer gave a sigh of relief. Their travels had been long and the terrains had been treacherous. Their mission was not complete, but at least they could find the energy to continue.
